original: 漢國派二萬七千兵進攻洛陽，方至河南已十二度擊敗晉軍，前後殲滅三萬餘人，洛陽皇宮遭大肆搜掠，宗廟被焚、皇陵遭盜。
text: The Han State sent 27,000 troops to attack Luoyang. Fang to Henan had defeated the Jin army twelve times, annihilating more than 30,000 people before and after. Luoyang Palace was ransacked, the ancestral temple was burned, and the imperial tomb was stolen.
